nodes.text: The Trade Outpost was a settlement on Dathomir.
The outpost was little more than a small, enclosed settlement. Some notable structures within the confines of the outpost included a humble tavern and spaceport.
Throughout 1 ABY, the Trade Outpost was frequented by many outsiders, mainly to trade in Dathomiri resources.
Some notabe residents of the outpost during this time included Wallaw Loowobbli, Singular Nak, Russell, and Nirame Sakute.

The Trade Outpost was one of three small outposts on Dathomir in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies that has it's own spaceport. The other two settlements that had a spaceport in the game were the Science Outpost and the Quarantine Zone. Star Wars Galaxies was shut down on December 15, 2011.
